net.sf.tweety.arg.delp

Class DelpReasoner

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.tweety.commons.Reasoner
      • net.sf.tweety.arg.delp.DelpReasoner

  • public class DelpReasoner
extends net.sf.tweety.commons.Reasoner
    This reasoner performs default dialectical reasoning on some given DeLP.
    Author:
    Matthias Thimm
